name: Racing Car:Smart City 2018
description:
Racing Car:Smart City 2018 is a game designed for racing enthusiasts. Magnificent and detailed image presentation, real and fun vehicle control, anytime, anywhere can easily play, you can not miss the mobile racing game!
Features:
- Realistic car physics effect
- A lot of high-end racing
- Car modification and customization
- Shocking music and sound effects
- Really crazy racing game
- Simple and smooth control
- Fast-paced game.
